info.title: Hello, I'm Apruxy 👋
info.description:
> Hi, my name is Apruxy, I'm an Axolotl Robot and I'm surfing this digital ocean! 🌊

I am currently present on ``{{serverNumber}}`` servers with ``{{commandsNumber}}`` commands 🥳

My pure soul was coded in [Typescript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) using [Discord.js](https://discord.js.org/) 🔧

Today I only know how to speak **Brazilian Portuguese** and **English**, who knows, maybe one day I will be able to learn new languages? 🤩

> Since <t:1703905200:D>, trying to transform the world! 
> I've been used ``{{usedTimes}}`` times ⭐️

ping.title: 🏓 Pong!
ping.description:
> My latency is ``{{botPing}}ms`` 📡
> The Discord API latency is ``{{apiPing}}ms`` 📡
